title: Pizza Dough
description: Makes two 9 inch deep dish pizza crusts.
directions: Combine flour, cornmeal, salt, and sugar in a large bowl.
Add yeast to warm water and add to mixture with with 1/4 cup of melted butter.
Kneed until dough is soft and supple (4-5 minutes).
Make dough into a ball and coat with olive oil.
Let rise until doubled in size (1-2 hours).
Roll dough into a 15x12 inch rectangle.
Spread 1/4 cup of softened butter onto the rectangle and roll into a short log.
Cut dough in half to form two balls and let it rise in greased bowl for 1 hour.
Roll dough into 12 inch circle and place into 9x2 inch pan.
Bake uncovered for 30 minutes, then covered with aluminum foid for 15 minutes at 425 degrees.
